articles.description: PIERRE, S.D. (KELO) — No new deaths were reported Tuesday as South Dakota reported less than 8,000 active coronavirus cases for the first time since mid-October. The death toll is at 1,381. There have been 435 deaths reported in December. In Tuesday’s update …
